purpose: The email announces the eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium, scheduled for June 17-19, 2025, in Montreal, Canada. It invites practitioners and researchers to participate and contribute, particularly through poster presentations. The symposium will focus on the themes of AgentOps and Intelligent Systems, featuring keynotes, sessions, and discussions led by experts in the field. The email also provides details about the program, registration deadlines, and submission guidelines for poster contributions.
